extendedInfo.description: Need to find information right away, use our app to search for books, movies and e-content. Review your library account and renew items. Connect directly to our blog or follow us on Facebook. Have a research question, ask us directly from your mobile device. We are here to help.We've invested in the latest mobile solution for libraries and we'll be adding new content over time. We hope you enjoy it as much as we do!
